item.title: Gaps within countries - Mapping Subnational HDI
item.description: Indicatorsâ€¦ albeit very useful to synthesise concepts, they are also good at hiding variations and putting slightly different situations into just one bucket. Sometimes the devil is in the details, and when we look through these generalisations we risk an overly simplistic view of things. Many argue this is case with the Human Development Index (HDI). The HDI aims to incorporate health and education measurements into a more balanced development metric.
